mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO board(seq, subject, content, boardtype, hit, joindate, email) VALUES (#{seq}, #{subject}, #{content}, 1, 0, sysdate, #{email}) INTO pparcelboard(seq, age, kind, weight, gender, feature, location) VALUES (#{seq}, #{age}, #{kind}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{feature}, #{location}) SELECT * FROM dual

INSERT ALL INTO board(seq, subject, content, boardtype, hit, joindate, email) VALUES (#{seq}, #{subject}, #{content}, 2, 0, sysdate, #{email}) INTO missingboard(seq, age, kind, petsize, feature, location, tel, missingdate) VALUES (#{seq}, #{age}, #{kind}, #{petsize}, #{feature}, #{location},#{tel}, #{date}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT b.seq, b.subject, b.content, b.boardtype, b.hit, b.joindate, b.email, p.age, p.kind, p.weight, p.gender, p.feature, p.location FROM board b, pparcelboard p WHERE b.seq=p.seq AND p.seq=#{seq}

SELECT b.seq, b.subject, b.content, b.boardtype, b.hit, b.joindate, b.email, d.centername,d.cdonationfee,d.gatheringfee,d.cdonationpurpose FROM board b, donationboard d WHERE b.seq=d.seq AND d.seq=#{seq}

SELECT b.seq, b.subject, b.content, b.boardtype, b.hit, b.joindate, b.email, m.tel,m.location,m.missingdate,m.kind,m.petsize,m.feature,m.age,m.gender FROM board b, missingboard m WHERE b.seq=m.seq AND m.seq=#{seq}

SELECT b.seq, b.subject, b.content, b.boardtype, b.hit, b.joindate, b.email, v.tel,v.centername,v.volunteerkind,v.volunteerdate,v.centerlocation FROM board b, volunteerboard v WHERE b.seq=v.seq AND v.seq=#{seq}
